item.title: Demand Hydraulic Pumps – No. 2 or No. 3 Demand Pump Systems

remarks.para: One may be inoperative deactivated provided demand pumps 1 and 4 are operative.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard adjacent to associated #2 or #3 Demand pump switch: "INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
